TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void GridViewCommandEventHandler(object sender, GridViewCommandEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed GridViewCommandEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub GridViewCommandEventHandler(sender As Object, e As GridViewCommandEventArgs)
public delegate void GridViewCommandEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, GridViewCommandEventArgs ^ e);
type GridViewCommandEventHandler = delegate of obj * GridViewCommandEventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件資料的 物件。

span.span: A object that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示處理 控制項之 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內按鈕時引發事件按一下控制項時。The event is raised when a button within the control is clicked. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，每當發生此事件的事件處理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 控制項也其他特製化時引發事件會按一下某些按鈕 (按鈕`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 刪除 」、 「 更新 」 和 「 頁面 」 範例)。The control also raises other specialized events when certain buttons are clicked (buttons with the `CommandName` property set to "Delete", "Update", and "Page" for example). 當使用其中一個按鈕時，您應該考慮處理其中一個控制項所提供的特定事件 (例如或)。When using one of these buttons, you should consider handling one of the specialized events provided by the control (such as or ). 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何以程式設計方式加入委派給事件控制項。The following example demonstrates how to programmatically add a delegate to the event of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewCommandEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewCommandEventHandler/CS/gridviewcommandeventhandlercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewCommandEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewCommandEventHandler/VB/gridviewcommandeventhandlervb.aspx#1)] 下列範例示範如何以宣告方式將委派給事件控制項。The following example demonstrates how to declaratively add a delegate to the event of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowCommmand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowCommmand/CS/gridviewrowcommandcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowCommmand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowCommmand/VB/gridviewrowcommandvb.aspx#1)]
